page.title: 07AN EMPLOYEE OF PORTALS
page.content: {An Employee of Portals} Mr. X has been working at the Mill for twenty years. He is not particularly contented because he thinks the pay is poor and his particular job, cutting the paper, is boring. The Mill works a shift system; three every 24 hours. The Mill opened in 1935. He began working there when he was 15 in 1966. Most of his family also work at the Mill but he would not recommend it to any school leaver because of conditions and pay. Workers only get one half hour break per shift. There used to be quite a few industrial accidents but since the introduction of the Health and Safety legisation they are now very few. There have been a lot of fires in the 'rag house', where the wet paper or 'stuff' is kept, as a result of spontaneous combustion rather than carelessness.
